name: 91 Day AI Transformation Podcast
description:
Transform your business with AI in just 91 days! Join me each week for real-world AI strategies that deliver immediate results. Every episode includes:
Transformation Stories: Learn from business leaders who've successfully used AI tools like ChatGPT, Claude, and MidJourney.
Actionable Tips: Step-by-step guidance to save time, boost profits, and add value to your business.
Expert Insights: Hear from AI pioneers and industry leaders sharing their experiences and solutions.
No theory—just practica

recent_episodes.title: Building a 7 Figure Business with AI | 91 Day AI Transformation Podcast
recent_episodes.description:
What does it really take to scale a business to seven figures in today’s AI-driven world? In this episode, Shannon Cascio shares how she’s leveraging artificial intelligence, smart systems, and strategic execution to build and scale a high-growth business—without burnout. ▶️ABOUT ME: 
Unlock the Power of AI for Your Business Success!

recent_episodes.title: Your Employees Are Using AI Behind Your Back (And You Should Let Them)
recent_episodes.description:
Your Employees Are Using AI Behind Your Back (And You Should Let Them)
Think your strict "No AI" policy is working? Think again.
In this episode, Jonathan Mast sits down with Jason from GHL Plugins, a serial entrepreneur who sold 16 companies before accidentally building a software empire.
Jason reveals the dirty little secret of the modern workforce: from airline mechanics to government officials, everyone is using AI in the "skunkworks". They aren’t doing it to be nefarious; they’re doing it t

recent_episodes.title: Sales Expert Reveals The Secret To GOOD AI Agents | 91 Day AI Transformation Podcast
recent_episodes.description:
This episode features Jonathan in conversation with Jay Vics, exploring how properly built sales agent systems can transform the way businesses attract and convert customers. Together, they break down why trained, well-implemented agents drive consistent results and why things can go off the rails quickly when the setup, data, or strategy is wrong.
Topics covered:
• What a “trained” sales agent actually means in practice
• The systems and data foundations required for reliable performance
